descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Untitled-4_zpsccxyn4uh.png~original[/img]
[img]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Untitled-1_zpsz7iihimd.png~original[/img]

[font=avanti][size=3][color=black][size=5][size=4][b]Also makes the [b][i][u]skill menu perk markers[/u][/i][/b] really stand out![/b][/size][/size][/color][/size][/font]

[font=avanti][color=#000000][size=3][font=avanti][size=5][color=black][size=4][b]All magical lights [b][i](Such as the Mages College)[/i][/b] also get an upgrade![/b][/size][/color][/size][/font][/size][/color][/font]

[font=avanti][size=3][color=black][size=5][size=4][b]Fully compatible with all other [color=orange][color=FFD700][i][b]Magic/Candlelight[/b][/i][/color][/color][/size][/size][color=87CEEB] [size=4][color=black]spells, provided they dont change the candlelight texture![/b][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size]

[img]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Untitled-2_zpsbj5avtts.png~original[/img]
[font=avanti][size=3][color=black][size=5][size=4][b]I personally recommend [b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11008/?]Candlelight Toggle[/url][/i][/b] for a toggleable candlelight spell![/b][/size][/size][/color][/size][/font]

[/font][font=avanti][img]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/d1ec3320-d03d-4da8-b217-2731154301a6_zpsec9jjhl4.png~original[/img]

[/font][size=3][color=black][b]Also available for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4686?]Skyrim Special Edition[/url]![/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: Diethardt
